By gathering [[dark chakra]] into both hands, the user can unleash a powerful and focused shock wave that, when it hits a person at close range, will cause tremendous internal damage.

[[es:Puño de Renacimiento]]
[[pl:Kasseiken]]
[[pt-br:Punho da Ativação]]
